name: Sybaris Indianapolis

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My boyfriend and I arrived at Sybaris at 5:30... We lived three hours away and had gotten there quicker that what I had Planned on. When we walked into the reservation area, we were greeted by two very friendly desk clerks. After signing the reciepts, I asked if we needed to wait since our reservation check in was at 6:00. She said no, we were more than welcome to start our stay a few moment early... Once we arrived at our mini apartment (each room is a seperate building apartment ) We walked into our room and were absoluley amazed. The room was gorgeous, and truly the most romantic I had ever been to. There were no windows in the rooms, so it was exclusive to you and your significant other. The room's cleanliness was impeccable as well.
reviews.title: Aboslutley amazing!

We loved it & keep going back every year!!!
reviews.text: It was the best place we have ever gone to & was really able to get away from our 3 teenage kids & everyday life in general! I would recomend it to anyone if your marriage is already wonderful or if you are having problems & want to fix it!

I have also been to Sybaris many times, the first trip was given to my wife and I by my mother in law for our honeymoon present. I alsways stay at the sybaris in Mequon WI the reason I am responding to this post is the writer stated that you have to pay for a yearly membership that is correct however with the sybaris in WI if you purchase a presidential pass for 5 continous years in a row you no longer have to ever buy another membership of any kind for life, and you also get free early check in or late check out.
reviews.title: I Have Been to Sybaris many times but the one in Mequon WI

reviews.text: We are always able to get early check in at around 12:30 pm and check out at 11:00 am the next day. I do agree the prices are up there but if your able to go on a monday thru wednesday the rate drops considerablly. I must admit I have never had any problems with the staff at Sybaris or the rooms themselves, I had asked one time to have the pool temp turned up and within 5 minutes one of thier charming staff people came right over and took care of it.
reviews.title: "Heaven on Earth"
AWESOME!!!
reviews.text: If you are looking for a trully memorable and romantic getaway I highly advise checking out any of the sybaris properties.

reviews.title: Fell in love all ova again
reviews.text: My husband and I visited the Sybaris International for our honeymoon. Only God knows the peace,love,serenity,and closeness we felt, and the foundation we established together at the Sybaris international. I could not have thought of a better way to begin our lives together, Sybaris is truly "Heaven on Earth". Whether your newlyweds, having an anniversary, or just want to get away there is no other place to go. Even if your having problems in your relationship and your not quite sure if it is over, if you go to Sybaris and your marriage is not restored it is definitely time to get out. Sybaris puts the Romance in Romantic and the Love in LOVE!! Words truly can not express how I felt on my honeymoon, but for the first time in my life I can feel my heart smiling. Thank you, Sybaris International This was a Dream come true.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a fun place to hang out in for a couple days! Very, very clean. I was somewhat worried about that before arriving. The outside grounds, and the neighborhood can be misleading. It sits in an industrial part of the city. But we obviously didnt go to Sybaris for the grounds. Once inside, we were really in our own world. Lots of fun stuff - swimming, steam room was very cool, jacuzzi was relaxing. Nice to bring our own food - there was microwave and fridge. And i cant say enough about the bed. It is cheesy, but fun. Not exactly romantic in the bed and breakfast type of way. But more in a wild way. Mirrors on ceiling, pretty lighting on bed, fake stars, fireplace, led to ambiance. Very nice massage chairs with rolling and kneading. Great sound system - fun for dancing in the pool area! Would go back a lot, but is somewhat pricey. Absolutely worth it though, and is about a 2 hour drive from home. Had some reservation problems surrounding pricing, and have to applaud the manager - I think Jeanette, and also Tara for really taking care of the issue. I was more than satisfied with solution, and cant wait for return visit!
reviews.title: Loved the Sybaris

likes.liked: — Privacy, didnt see anyone from outside world for over 24 hours!

reviews.title: Simply amazing
reviews.text: Me and My boyfriend just got back from our stay at the Sybaris Indianapolis. It is rather pricey but very worth it, it was our 5 year anniversary and I couldn't have asked for anything more. We arrived a little early at 5:20 and the staff were more than happy to get us in a little bit early. We stayed in the Majestic Suite , we walked in and couldn't believe how beautiful it was. The bed was amazing with all of the cool lighting features and mirrors above and around the bed was very fun :) the bathroom was huge pool was perfect for the two of us, Steam room was Ok it was very hard to breathe in that thing but was still nice. The water was soo warm we must have swam for 4 hours that night. Jacuzzi was very nice jets were wonderful. I could go on and on about our stay I strongly recommend this place, wish there was one in Ohio, because that 5 hour drive was rough but once we arrived we had no problem relaxing.

reviews.title: Totally Not Worth THAT Much Money
reviews.text: I can only say that I wish I would not have spent $444.00 on a hotel room that was in a gross industrial area, and where I only got to stay for 12 hours. PLEASE! Most hotels at least let you check in at 3pm, not here, it's 6pm, and check out is at 11am. That is completely ridiculous. For this price the hotel should have offered complementary wine or champagne, and some sort of food item as well. Not to mention, the cable stations on the TV were pretty bad too, and there is no plug in for an iPod to play your own music, which really sucked too. If you feel like having a good cheesy night at a "sex" hotel, I would say stay here. However, it is definitley not worth that much money, maybe $300.00...if they thow in some champagne.

We stayed 3 nights.

description: Sybaris Pool Suites located in Indianapolis, Indiana is a Romantic Paradise like no other. The suites feature your own private swimming pool with a tropical waterfall, soothing whirlpool tub, misting steamroom, cozy fireplace, relaxing massage chairs and so much more to make your stay unforgettable.
